thread.title: What happens when Google pushes into branding and messaging?
thread.title_full: What happens when Google pushes into branding and messaging?

author: Pauline Jakober
title: What happens when Google pushes into branding and messaging?
text:
As Google elbows its way further into PPC branding, columnist Pauline Jakober discusses the drawbacks of automating tasks that impact messaging and branding.

Please visit Marketing Land for the full article.
